sections.name: base
sections.description: Core stock-market utilities for quotes, historical data, and symbol search.

endpoints.name: get_quote
endpoints.description: Fetch a real-time fast-info snapshot plus the most recent completed OHLC bar...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary containing 'quote' metadata fields and a one-row 'data' array with the latest OHLC values.

endpoints.name: get_historical_data
endpoints.description: Download normalized OHLCV history for any ticker...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary with metadata (interval/period) and serialized pandas DataFrame rows in 'data'.

endpoints.name: get_bulk_quotes
endpoints.description: Batch version of get_quote that accepts dozens of tickers...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary with 'quotes' list, one entry per ticker.

endpoints.name: search_symbols
endpoints.signature: search_symbols(keywords: str, region='US', quotes_count=10) -> Dict[str, Any]
endpoints.description: Structured wrapper around Yahoo's symbol search...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary containing the original query/region plus either 'results' or an error payload.

sections.name: crypto
sections.description: Endpoints for cryptocurrency quotes and analytics.

endpoints.name: get_crypto_price
endpoints.signature: get_crypto_price(symbol: str, include_chart: bool = False) -> Dict[str, Any]
endpoints.description: Return the latest fast-info snapshot for a crypto pair...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary with 'quote' and up to 5 days of 'recent' OHLCV data.

sections.name: commodities
sections.description: Endpoints for commodity quotes and related analytics.

endpoints.name: get_commodity_price
endpoints.signature: get_commodity_price(symbol: str, include_chart: bool = False) -> Dict[str, Any]
endpoints.description: Provide headline quote details for liquid commodities...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary with 'quote' (fast-info fields) and 'recent' OHLC rows.

sections.name: technical
sections.description: Technical indicator calculations and charting utilities. Includes all common indicators (RSI, MACD, SMA, etc.) implemented by the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: technical_analysis
endpoints.signature: technical_analysis(symbol: str, indicators: List[str] | None = None, period: str = "1y", interval: str = "1d", ...)
endpoints.description: Compute a full technical-analysis bundle over the requested window. This is the parent tool that implements all individual indicators.
endpoints.returns: Dictionary containing indicator outputs under the "indicators" key.

endpoints.name: SMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the Simple Moving Average (SMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: EMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the Exponential Moving Average (EMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: WMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the Weighted Moving Average (WMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: DEMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the Double Exponential Moving Average (DEMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: TEMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the Triple Exponential Moving Average (TEMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: TRIMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the Triangular Moving Average (TRIMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: KAMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the Kaufman Adaptive Moving Average (KAMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MAMA
endpoints.description: Calculates the MESA Adaptive Moving Average (MAMA). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: VWAP
endpoints.description: Calculates the Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: T3
endpoints.description: Calculates the T3 Moving Average. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MACD
endpoints.description: Calculates Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MACDEXT
endpoints.description: Calculates MACD with controllable MA type. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: STOCH
endpoints.description: Calculates Stochastic Oscillator (STOCH). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: STOCHF
endpoints.description: Calculates Stochastic Fast (STOCHF). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: RSI
endpoints.description: Calculates Relative Strength Index (RSI). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: STOCHRSI
endpoints.description: Calculates Stochastic RSI (STOCHRSI). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: WILLR
endpoints.description: Calculates Williams' %R (WILLR). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: ADX
endpoints.description: Calculates Average Directional Movement Index (ADX). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: ADXR
endpoints.description: Calculates Average Directional Movement Index Rating (ADXR). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: APO
endpoints.description: Calculates Absolute Price Oscillator (APO). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: PPO
endpoints.description: Calculates Percentage Price Oscillator (PPO). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MOM
endpoints.description: Calculates Momentum (MOM). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: BOP
endpoints.description: Calculates Balance of Power (BOP). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: CCI
endpoints.description: Calculates Commodity Channel Index (CCI). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: CMO
endpoints.description: Calculates Chande Momentum Oscillator (CMO). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: ROC
endpoints.description: Calculates Rate of Change (ROC). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: ROCR
endpoints.description: Calculates Rate of Change Ratio (ROCR). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: AROON
endpoints.description: Calculates Aroon. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: AROONOSC
endpoints.description: Calculates Aroon Oscillator (AROONOSC). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MFI
endpoints.description: Calculates Money Flow Index (MFI). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: TRIX
endpoints.description: Calculates 1-day Rate of Change (ROC) of a TEMA (TRIX). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: ULTOSC
endpoints.description: Calculates Ultimate Oscillator (ULTOSC). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: DX
endpoints.description: Calculates Directional Movement Index (DX). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MINUS_DI
endpoints.description: Calculates Minus Directional Indicator (MINUS_DI). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: PLUS_DI
endpoints.description: Calculates Plus Directional Indicator (PLUS_DI). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MINUS_DM
endpoints.description: Calculates Minus Directional Movement (MINUS_DM). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: PLUS_DM
endpoints.description: Calculates Plus Directional Movement (PLUS_DM). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: BBANDS
endpoints.description: Calculates Bollinger Bands (BBANDS). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MIDPOINT
endpoints.description: Calculates MidPoint over period. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: MIDPRICE
endpoints.description: Calculates Midpoint Price over period. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: SAR
endpoints.description: Calculates Parabolic SAR. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: TRANGE
endpoints.description: Calculates True Range (TRANGE). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: ATR
endpoints.description: Calculates Average True Range (ATR). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: NATR
endpoints.description: Calculates Normalized Average True Range (NATR). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: AD
endpoints.description: Calculates Chaikin A/D Line (AD). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: ADOSC
endpoints.description: Calculates Chaikin A/D Oscillator (ADOSC). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: OBV
endpoints.description: Calculates On Balance Volume (OBV). Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: HT_TRENDLINE
endpoints.description: Calculates Hilbert Transform - Instantaneous Trendline. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: HT_SINE
endpoints.description: Calculates Hilbert Transform - SineWave. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: HT_TRENDMODE
endpoints.description: Calculates Hilbert Transform - Trend vs Cycle Mode. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: HT_DCPERIOD
endpoints.description: Calculates Hilbert Transform - Dominant Cycle Period. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: HT_DCPHASE
endpoints.description: Calculates Hilbert Transform - Dominant Cycle Phase. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

endpoints.name: HT_PHASOR
endpoints.description: Calculates Hilbert Transform - Phasor Components. Virtual endpoint for the 'technical_analysis' tool.

sections.name: fundamentals
sections.description: Company fundamentals, financial statements, key metrics, and valuation data.

endpoints.name: get_company_overview
endpoints.description: Pull the company profile overlay...

endpoints.name: get_fundamentals
endpoints.description: Return a consolidated fundamentals pack...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary combining overview, statements, ratios, and optionally a chart.

sections.name: options
sections.description: Options chain retrieval, implied volatility analytics, and volume tools.

endpoints.name: get_options_chain
endpoints.signature: get_options_chain(symbol: str, expiration: str | None = None, ...)
endpoints.description: Retrieve the full calls/puts chain for a given expiration...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary with expiration metadata, available expirations, and serialized calls/puts tables.

endpoints.name: get_implied_volatility
endpoints.signature: get_implied_volatility(symbol: str, expiration: str | None = None, ...)
endpoints.description: Build a summarized implied-volatility view for one expiration...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary with average call/put implied volatility and arrays of per-strike IV values.

sections.name: economics
sections.description: Macro indicators, treasury rates, and market sentiment utilities.

endpoints.name: get_treasury_rates
endpoints.description: Return the latest Treasury yields for standard maturities...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary with per-maturity rates, plus optional chart.

endpoints.name: get_market_sentiment
endpoints.description: Fetch a consolidated view of volatility-based gauges (VIX, VXN, RVX, SKEW, etc.)...
endpoints.returns: Dictionary containing sentiment metric values and descriptions.
